html:
10.29.17  2:09 pm   what are the best things in life?

     there will be a contest coming up, and we will find out, once and for all

10.29.17  1:23 pm   do you ever get writer's block?

     maybe but it doesn't last very long

      if so, how do you deal with it?

     think outside the block

10.29.17  1:05 pm   Are you the queen of england?

     not yet

10.29.17  1:03 pm   hows the video coming along?

     good but not progressing nearly fast enough

10.29.17  12:33 pm   i have a song in waltz, around 70 bpm or so, and my verses and chorus are Am, E7 consecutively, i want to write a good bridge for that but i cant come up with a strong chord and i dont really want to use a usual weak one, any progression ideas?

     how about taking the entire song into consideration, as a whole. including the melody and lyrical contents, all together

10.29.17  12:31 pm   10.28.17  2:02 pm Wait... do ad companies really have access to our emails? 

     not directly but they have made deals with your email provider

10.29.17  11:30 am   If all we'll ever do in life is move a relatively small

     or relatively large, depending on the other thing you are comparing it to

     amount of atoms in a slightly different way in a forgotton corner of the universe,

     i remember it, and so do you, and everyone we both know

      what's the point?

     see what's possible

10.29.17  8:00 am   Is this the questions page, or is it the how to avoid answering questions properly and instead giving elusive and vague resposnses page?

     ah, or is it the passive agressive critiques page

10.29.17  6:17 am   What are your thoughts about Autonomous Sensorial Meridian Response and its internet community?

     back in my day, that was just called whispering

10.29.17  5:44 am   Hi Bill. I dreamt the person I like. In the dream, she was angry with me because I avoided her yesterday evening, when she was hanging out with her boyfriend. In fact I have always avoided her since I discovered she had a boyfriend. How to end this torment? It's also difficult not to see her because she's redhead and you can see her five kilometers away

     i think you should try having dreams about someone else

10.29.17  5:31 am   Wich one do you prefer Esperanto or Swahili?

     i don't know either but swahili is real, so i would prefer that one

10.29.17  5:23 am   Do you wear socks indoors?

     yes

10.29.17  5:10 am   What colour/s should I paint my nails?

     human

10.29.17  2:28 am   how is your latest test to see if the internet still works coming along

     i try not to think about it too much, because i am always paranoid that it somehow doesn't work. it's kind of like a megaphone. no time to check if it works, because if it doesn't work there's not much you could do anyway. just make sure to keep yelling

10.29.17  12:53 am   how about posting stuff before it's finished

     seems legit

10.28.17  11:00 pm   can i use your music for projects and videos?

     i think you should use someone else's music instead, or better yet, make your own! that's what i do

10.28.17  10:57 pm   help dick stuck in toaster

     it will pop out when it's done

10.28.17  9:03 pm   i haven't studied for my quiz on monday, quick what happened from 1914-1920?

     europe had a war, the Great War, the war to end all wars. this was good because it would prevent the need to fight any future wars ever again, and there have not been any other wars since

10.28.17  8:43 pm   What notes (or what interval?) do the police sirens play where you live? 

     they are pretty crazy. i assume there's a guy in the passenger seat just goin to town on an analog synth

10.28.17  8:28 pm   Also what is the time space continuum? I hear about it a lot but i don't necessarily know what it means for sure

     it's like the playing field, for the reality we live in

10.28.17  8:20 pm   what happens if you need to write something down, but you don't have a way to record it anywhere in that moment

     there are ways to be in very close reach of a recording device at all times

10.28.17  8:09 pm   How do i find my soulmate(s)

     just do what you do best. and as long as they are too, then you will surely run into each other

10.28.17  7:40 pm   4.4.16  1:30 am which names might those be?

      4.4.16  7:22 am

10.28.17  7:39 pm   Can I give you attention?

     sure

     I want to give you attention

10.28.17  7:09 pm   Post. The new thing. Stop having it be not posted (please (thanks (I love you bill!))).

     it is not finished

10.28.17  6:40 pm   Why do you use times new Roman as the font on this page?

     i do not, but i suppose my question to you would be, why do you have your browser set to times new roman as the default font

10.28.17  6:39 pm   You're a really good musician! How did this happen? Rigorous academic study? 

     absolutely not

10.28.17  6:38 pm   Can you add a search bar for this ueqstions page? I think it would stop spam.

     are you sure

10.28.17  6:24 pm   What's the tempo of the new tune?

     104

10.28.17  6:08 pm   If someone was born with a 3rd nostril, would their sense of smell be superior to us binostriled folk?

     no

10.28.17  4:28 pm   Why do some people say "sorry English is my second language" but then go on to speak perfect English?

     they are giving you a subtle hint that there is another language they speak even better

10.28.17  4:26 pm   why do you always answer one word questions with "I see what you mean"

     if you think i always do that, then you have probably not been reading this page for very long

10.28.17  4:23 pm   will you please consider releasing the new video on Tuesday, or do you get too many questions if the video that is released on a "holiday" doesn't share the theme of that day? That day is creepy to me. A new video would make it better. thank you

     i probably can't do that, because it will not be done by that time

10.28.17  4:22 pm   Where do you get all the animation in the videos "history of"? 

     i made it myself

10.28.17  2:20 pm   what is the best joke you have ever heard?

     a man named alexander graham telephone invented the bell

10.28.17  2:15 pm   What's your favorite type of bread?

     sticks

10.28.17  2:02 pm   What isnt your hobby

     receiving better, more relevant ads, based on my spending habits and the contents of my personal emails

10.28.17  1:58 pm   Do you like sleeping

     yes

     or do you think it's just a waste of time?

     yes

10.28.17  12:33 pm   How come they haven't invented a built-in speaker on a computer/phone where you can actually hear the damn bass?

     i've talked to the experts, and they say in order to get bass you need something that takes up a larger amount of space. which will not happen if the devices are that thin

10.28.17  12:18 pm   Why did u say "thank you" and that's it in the short awards?

     why not

10.28.17  12:16 pm   What does 'queue' mean

     it's like a line of people waiting for something

     and how do you pronounce it?

10.28.17  11:34 am   Why do you think people find it so hard to write in 5/4 time?

     i don't think it's really necessary to deliberately write catering to a certain time signature, unless you're doing some kind of exercise. just write the thing how you want, and then decide later how best to measure the time

10.28.17  11:05 am   Do you think that any artist who hits a vein with popular culture is bound to have imitations/ parodies/ rip-offs of their work? Is this something can be avoided and if not is it better the simply accept it or take a more aggressive stance?

     i think they should probably focus more on their own new work

10.28.17  10:47 am   what was life like in the year 2000?

     you could take a 10 gallon jug of shampoo on an airplane, no questions asked. even while wearing a turban

10.28.17  10:32 am   I'm asking a question 

     ah, i see what you mean

10.28.17  10:09 am   Can you do a history of every country? Now we only have Japan and we want mooooorrreeeeeeee

     i don't think that is a good use of my time

10.28.17  7:34 am   if you were to make a religion what would it be? And why?

     why would i think about a religion i 'would' make but am not making? wouldn't it be better to focus on whichever one(s) i am actually making

10.28.17  5:50 am   Why do you say bad words?

     i try to say the best words i can. but i guess my question to you would be why do you think my words are bad

10.28.17  5:14 am   I'm really indignant because of the answer I got from you. Are you sorry about that?

     i will check what the word indignant means, but i don't know if that will help me figure out which question was yours

10.28.17  4:58 am   Are any of songs you are going to make going to be made without music videos?

     not anymore
